response.overview: The boy action is non-stop in this one of a kind film noir thriller that proves that even in death there can be a “happy ending!” In fact this 25 minute short film is crammed with no less then 3 of them as we follow an unstable teenager on his deadly quest for revenge of a broken “Blind Date” Then stay tuned for the raw and un-edited-behind the scenes sex with gay porn stars Addison Graham and Taylor Reign. Newcomer Jimmy Fame plays the unstable teen who works up his own “happy ending” solo!
response.title: Blind Date
